definition: seven emotional states/seven affects of traditional Chinese medical theory and therapy, namely: joy 喜[xi3], anger 怒[nu4], anxiety 憂|忧[you1], thought 思[si1], grief 悲[bei1], fear 恐[kong3], fright 驚|惊[jing1]/seven relations

sentences.english: People have emotions, feelings did not ring true To reach the grief of Health.
sentences.chinese: 人有七情六欲，情不顺欲不达则悲生。

sentences.english: The adjustment can be seen seven emotions, physical well-being is very important.
sentences.chinese: 可见七情的调适，对身体安康很重要。

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子与干姜的配伍，较好的反映了配伍七情的相对性。

sentences.english: Western medicine's "Seven Emotions" disease is well founded.
sentences.chinese: 西医的“七情”致病很有道理。

sentences.english: We conceal our feelings and desires in the head with untidy hair.
sentences.chinese: 人的七情六欲，都隐藏在乱发遮掩的脑袋里。

sentences.english: The seven emotions refer to the human mental activities.
sentences.chinese: 七情指的是人的精神活动。

sentences.english: If deprive the mind's opportunity of roaming, it will incur emotion disorder and out of control.
sentences.chinese: 当心遨游的机会被局限，七情六欲就会混乱而失控。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
seven mortal forms in Daoism, representing carnal life and desires/contrasted with 三魂 three immortal souls
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
